name: Lirael T'alzar

ac.notes: Mithral Chain Shirt +1, Amulet of Protection

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Lirael has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Lirael has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Kael, the Raven Familiar
traits.desc: Lirael has a permanent raven familiar named Kael, which acts on her turn. She can communicate with it telepathically within 100 feet and use it to deliver touch spells.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Lirael is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following bard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): Mage Hand, Minor Illusion, Vicious Mockery
1st level (4 slots): Charm Person, Dissonant Whispers, Healing Word, Silvery Barbs
2nd level (3 slots): Heat Metal, Hold Person, Suggestion
3rd level (3 slots): Counterspell, Fireball, Hypnotic Pattern
4th level (3 slots): Confusion, Greater Invisibility
5th level (1 slot): Legend Lore

traits.name: Instrument of the Bards (Runecarved Flute)
traits.desc: Lirael's ebony flute can be used as a spellcasting focus. Creatures have disadvantage on saves vs. her charm spells. Once per day, she can use it to cast Fly, Invisibility, Levitate, Protection from Evil and Good, Darkness, Faerie Fire, Web, and Maddening Darkness.

traits.name: Bardic Inspiration (5/Short Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Lirael can inspire an ally within 60 feet. The ally gains a d8 Bardic Inspiration die to add to one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

traits.name: Jack of All Trades
traits.desc: Lirael adds half her proficiency bonus (+2) to any ability check that doesn't already include her proficiency bonus.

traits.name: Song of Rest (d8)
traits.desc: During a short rest, Lirael can perform a song that helps allies recover. Any ally who hears the song regains an extra 1d8 hit points if they spend Hit Dice during the rest.

traits.name: Additional Magical Secrets
traits.desc: Lirael chose two spells from other classes: Counterspell and Fireball.

traits.name: Cutting Words
traits.desc: When a creature Lirael can see within 60 feet makes an attack roll, ability check, or damage roll, she can use her reaction to spend a Bardic Inspiration die and reduce the roll by the number rolled.

actions.name: Vicious Mockery
actions.desc: Target must succeed on a DC 17 WIS save or take 2d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

actions.name: +1 Rapier
actions.desc: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target is instead unconscious for 1 hour.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: On a hit, target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target is instead unconscious for 1 hour.

bonus_actions.name: Bardic Inspiration
bonus_actions.desc: Lirael chooses one ally within 60 feet who can hear her. That creature gains one Bardic Inspiration die (d8).

bonus_actions.name: Healing Word
bonus_actions.desc: Lirael can cast healing word as a bonus action, restoring 1d4 + 5 hit points to a creature within 60 feet.

reactions.name: Cutting Words
reactions.desc: When a creature within 60 feet makes an attack roll, ability check, or damage roll, Lirael can spend a Bardic Inspiration die to reduce the roll by the amount rolled on the die.

bio: Lirael T'alzar is the strategic mentor of House T'alzar. After her mother was wounded and her sister's betrayal, Lirael has stepped up to rally the survivors, guiding them with a cold, calculating efficiency. Her role as the older sister makes her both advisor and de-facto leader of the T'alzar fugitives. She is never without her raven familiar, Kael.
